player

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • player.Player
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Dealer, Gambler

    public abstract class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    This Player Abstract Class holds most of the functionality for both the Gambler and Dealer. It contains the getters and setters, handles their Hand, and determines with whether the play has bust or not.
    Author:
    RossWeinstein

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Player()
      Constructs a basic player with a blank hand who has not busted

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clearHand()
      Removes all cards from the Player's hand
      Hand getHand()
      Returns the Hand object
      int getHandTotal()
      Returns the current Player's Blackjack Hand Total
      void hasBust()
      Sets the player's bust status to true
      boolean hasPlayerBust()
      Returns whether the Player's Hand is greater than 21
      void hit(Card nextCard)
      Allows a player to receive a new card from the deck
      void printHandInfo()
      Prints to the console the Player's hand total and each card in their hand.
      java.lang.String showHand()
      Returns each Card in the Hand
      abstract java.lang.String showHandTotal()
      Returns Player's Blackjack Hand Total as String.

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Player

        public Player()
        Constructs a basic player with a blank hand who has not busted

    • Method Detail

      • hasPlayerBust

        public boolean hasPlayerBust()
        Returns whether the Player's Hand is greater than 21
        Returns:
        boolean returns true if player has bust; false otherwise

      • hasBust

        public void hasBust()
        Sets the player's bust status to true

      • hit

        public void hit(Card nextCard)
        Allows a player to receive a new card from the deck
        Parameters:
        nextCard - takes an available card from the deck

      • getHand

        public Hand getHand()
        Returns the Hand object
        Returns:
        Hand returns the Hand object from Player

      • getHandTotal

        public int getHandTotal()
        Returns the current Player's Blackjack Hand Total
        Returns:
        int returns the Player's current Hand total

      • showHand

        public java.lang.String showHand()
        Returns each Card in the Hand
        Returns:
        String returns each Card in the Hand in sequence

      • showHandTotal

        public abstract java.lang.String showHandTotal()
        Returns Player's Blackjack Hand Total as String. Abstract method allows child classes to add appropriate title
        Returns:
        String returns all the Player's Cards in sequence and their Hand total

      • clearHand

        public void clearHand()
        Removes all cards from the Player's hand

      • printHandInfo

        public void printHandInfo()
        Prints to the console the Player's hand total and each card in their hand. If the player has busted, it appends the word 'BUST!!!' to their hand readout.
